name: auto-exports
description: creates a module.exports map for all modules in a directory

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push && echo '- - - don't forget to tag the release on github! - - -'
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push && echo '- - - don't forget to tag the release on github! - - -'
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish && git push && echo '- - - don't forget to tag the release on github! - - -'

author: Eliran Malka
